{{Marvel Database:Team Template | Image = | Name = [[Beta Flight]] | Aliases = Playpen Patrol; Betans | Distinguish1 = Beta Flight | Status = Defunct | Identity = Secret | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = [[Department H (Toronto)]], [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]], [[Canada]]; formerly [[Department H (Ottawa)]], [[Ottawa]], Ontario, Canada; [[Mansion Alpha]], [[British Columbia]], Canada | Leaders = | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Roger Bochs (Earth-616)|Box (Bochs)]], [[Whitman Knapp (Earth-616)|Manikin]], [[Marrina Smallwood (Earth-616)|Marrina]], [[Albert Louis (Earth-616)|Feedback]], [[Gardner Monroe (Earth-616)|Flashback]], [[Adrian Corbo (Earth-616)|Flex]], [[Lilli Stephens (Earth-616)|Ghost Girl]], [[Goblyn (Earth-616)|Goblyn]], [[James Hudson (Clone) (Earth-616)|Guardian (Clone)]], [[Bernie Lachenay (Earth-616)|Manbot]], [[Arlette Truffaut (Earth-616)|Murmur]], [[Laura Dean (Earth-616)|Pathway]], [[Kara Killgrave (Earth-616)|Persuasion]], [[Eugene Judd (Earth-616)|Puck]], [[Jared Corbo (Earth-616)|Radius]], [[Elizabeth Twoyoungmen (Earth-616)|Talisman]], [[Ananym (Earth-616)|Witchfire]] | Allies = [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]] | Enemies = [[Eshu (Earth-616)|Master of the World]], [[Omega Flight (Master) (Earth-616)|Omega Flight]], [[Dreamqueen (Earth-616)|Dreamqueen]] | Origin = Government-sponsored group; training group for Alpha Flight | PlaceOfFormation = [[Ottawa]], [[Ontario]], [[Canada]] | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = John Byrne | First = Alpha Flight Vol 1 1 | Last = | HistoryText = Beta Flight is a training division of [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]]. The team has gone through several incarnations. Consistently the team has been less experienced (and/or younger) Canadian heroes who are training to be in Alpha Flight. The first incarnation of Beta Flight was created by [[James Hudson (Earth-616)|James Hudson]] after the failure of his first super-human response team, the [[Flight (Earth-616)|Flight]]. This version was later disbanded when the Canadian government cut all funding to [[Department H (Earth-616)|Department H]] after several missions were deemed failures.
Membership consisted of:
Roger_Bochs_(Earth-616)_from_Official_Handbook_of_the_Marvel_Universe_Vol_2_2_0001.jpg|[[Roger Bochs (Earth-616)|Box (Bochs)]] File:Marrina Smallwood (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 4 3 001.jpg|[[Marrina Smallwood (Earth-616)|Marrina]] File:Eugene Judd (Earth-616) from Uncanny X-Force Vol 2 4 Larroca Variant Cover.jpg|[[Eugene Judd (Earth-616)|Puck]] Gardner Monroe (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 1 12.png|[[Gardner Monroe (Earth-616)|Flashback]]
The second team to be known as Beta Flight was created by [[Heather Hudson (Earth-616)|Heather Hudson]] after Alpha Flight became allied with several young super-humans. This team broke up briefly following Alpha Flight's return from a trip in outer space.
Membership consisted of:
File:Kara Killgrave (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 4 0.1.png|[[Kara Killgrave (Earth-616)|Purple Girl]] File:Whitman Knapp (Earth-616) from Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Vol 3 3.jpg|[[Whitman Knapp (Earth-616)|Manikin]] Laura Dean (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 1 114 0001.jpg|[[Laura Dean (Earth-616)|Pathway]] File:Goblyn (Earth-616) from Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Vol 3 3.jpg|[[Goblyn (Earth-616)|Goblyn]]
After Alpha Flight re-gained government sponsorship, they soon sponsored another Beta Flight. Given the experience its members, Beta Flight was deemd ready for field duty. [[Colin Hume (Earth-616)|Windshear]] acted as their advisor/liaison.
Membership consisted of all Betans from previous incaration as well as:
Elizabeth Twoyoungmen (Earth-616) from Amazing X-Men Vol 2 9 001.png|[[Elizabeth Twoyoungmen (Earth-616)|Talisman]] File:Albert Louis (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 1 118.jpg|[[Albert Louis (Earth-616)|Feedback]] File:X-Infernus Vol 1 3 Textless.jpg|[[Ananym (Earth-616)|Witchfire]]
The most recent incarnation of Beta Flight consisted of newer heroes who served (for a time) as Alpha Flight.
Its members:
James Hudson (Clone) (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 2 2 003.jpg|[[James Hudson (Clone) (Earth-616)|Guardian (Clone)]] File:Adrian Corbo (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 2 18.jpg|[[Adrian Corbo (Earth-616)|Flex]] File:Jared Corbo (Earth-616) from Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 9.jpg|[[Jared Corbo (Earth-616)|Radius]] Arlette Truffaut (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 2 2 005.jpg|[[Arlette Truffaut (Earth-616)|Murmur]] File:Lilli Stephens (Earth-616) from Alpha Flight Vol 2 16.jpg|[[Lilli Stephens (Earth-616)|Ghost Girl]] File:Bernie Lachenay (Earth-616) from Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A-Z Update Vol 1 1 001.jpg|[[Bernie Lachenay (Earth-616)|Manbot]]
